Caption: Dr. A. L. Mudaliar addresses the audience
Description: Chief guest Mr. C. Subramaniam is seen sitting (first from left). He was Minister for Education, Law and Finance for Madras State from 1952 to 1962. Subramaniam was also present at the inauguration function of the Computer Centre in 1973. At the time, he had just completed his tenure as Deputy Chairman of the Planning Commission (1971-1972).The trophies and prizes placed on the table would be distributed to prize winners and students who had accomplished feats during the academic year.
